name: minions
description: Inspired by [Stripe's Minions](https://stripe.dev/blog/minions-stripes-one-shot-end-to-end-coding-agents) and [OpenClaw](https://github.com/nichochar/open-claw)'s design philosophy, Open Minions is an open-source, one-shot, end-to-end AI coding agent system built for GitLab CI/CD workflows.
